name: Burt Roger (Pirate Jam 2019)
description:
Avast ye! Thy arch nemesis has tracked down your ship and is ready to board. With help of your trusty buccaneers, no hostile man shall leave the deck alive.

Use WASD or arrow keys to navigate, mouse to aim and fire.

Crates provide cover from gunfire, but don't fret even if hurt - some enemies drop godly nectar to wash your wounds away, or at least forget about 'em.
